## Install Dependencies
```
protostar install OpenZeppelin/cairo-contracts@v0.5.1
```
## Build Contract
```
protostar build --cairo-path ./lib/cairo_contracts/src
```

## Set private key for local Devnet
```
touch .pkey_local
```

## Deploy players registry (admin)
```
protostar -p devnet declare ./build/players_registry.json --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto

protostar -p devnet deploy 0x05db7eb921593a29e41ec904de97b7f69db02a532da935b06a3c8f2678512971 --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto -i 2229195667427071297143342999133310373395611149256223784343082293246336070172

protostar -p devnet call --contract-address 0x0514cec3bbed728f67ac8ad4cbc2f41117dd275def238881ca008ea869cf2f06 --function "is_exercise_or_admin" --inputs 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c
```

## Deploy TUTOERC20
```
protostar -p devnet declare ./build/TUTOERC20.json --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto

protostar -p devnet deploy 0x0015b1abb9eb21e540a1c7550648837d5eec1481fa5ec112c30724f532be553e --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto -i 1278752977803006783537 1278752977803006783537 0 0 2229195667427071297143342999133310373395611149256223784343082293246336070172 2229195667427071297143342999133310373395611149256223784343082293246336070172
```

## Deploy dummy token (DummyToken-ERC20 DTK20 admin)
```
protostar -p devnet declare ./build/dummy_token.json --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto

protostar -p devnet deploy 0x05fee25dd4509206023b8152c666071b7062be7994cb02774a83e5798a2227bc --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto -i 90997221901889128397906381721202537008 293471990320 100000000000000000000 0 2229195667427071297143342999133310373395611149256223784343082293246336070172

protostar -p devnet call --contract-address 0x059729a74b7a586871a3fc78d8e7bb78a6b93ac87ac30e7d3a7db3474320a0bb --inputs 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --function "balanceOf"
```

## Deploy Evaluator
```
protostar -p devnet declare ./build/Evaluator.json --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto

protostar -p devnet deploy 0x04a80628e99bec64da138d1b1d29f6567a9fd26fad8077febd8b6aa47e61a606 --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --private-key-path ./.pkey_local --max-fee auto -i 2298328220940017357119406247779235836107887207590773793603949595317276454662 203238126057409383060388293026571663532392210463047318799822935490631386756 2528645631557931633198849013153847133666113320851683839861518860374237028539 2 2229195667427071297143342999133310373395611149256223784343082293246336070172
```

## Set Random Values
```


starknet invoke --address 0x023b86c1dadc957515a5f1b6a55c0df2753c99e0d3d1352aa599f1b28404cb0a --function set_random_values --abi ./build/Evaluator_abi.json  --inputs 100 1146045253 1246123597 1095194946 1229539148 1146378315 1447972440 1380930885 1481919816 1514423620 1380865093 1447970121 1347639363 1313424714 1314149714 1314282072 1514358355 1481263182 1146178124 1213156683 1129270861 1514623319 1515081808 1331315536 1229672001 1111704643 1230651986 1380731732 1162824782 1296586325 1112163394 1498369876 1246844240 1481984340 1111641942 1196639555 1280789843 1196051542 1514494545 1297763154 1481919820 1313362001 1095586649 1431589459 1313754188 1096174913 1262765395 1196578885 1431062350 1245924184 1498497603 1263229530 1313559621 1096239194 1096112194 1380800078 1112688714 1163480154 1296519509 1465404249 1263224399 1380271447 1296191831 1279677518 1431785299 1180191310 1129989449 1297634636 1363957319 1380666188 1380996691 1346586457 1415136583 1363299162 1280070481 1246843724 1331123524 1380995159 1497846082 1263554369 1146504773 1162037337 1095453511 1447712589 1213091650 1229670221 1297238857 1431328854 1515017289 1230133831 1195526998 1346521154 1280464705 1431849558 1230262872 1095648083 1413761609 1162824514 1331057752 1262637655 1145130563 0 --feeder_gateway_url http://127.0.0.1:5050  --gateway_url http://127.0.0.1:5050
```

## Set evaluator as admin in TUTOERC20
```
protostar -p devnet invoke --contract-address 0x00730759127fd8b83c043449b2b1162bbf2879bc6dd7ab062c7c3bfa9b014684 --function "set_teacher" --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --inputs 0x023b86c1dadc957515a5f1b6a55c0df2753c99e0d3d1352aa599f1b28404cb0a 1 --max-fee auto --private-key-path ./.pkey_local

protostar -p devnet call --contract-address 0x00730759127fd8b83c043449b2b1162bbf2879bc6dd7ab062c7c3bfa9b014684 --function "is_teacher_or_exercise" --inputs 0x023b86c1dadc957515a5f1b6a55c0df2753c99e0d3d1352aa599f1b28404cb0a
```

## Set evaluator as admin in players registry
```
protostar -p devnet invoke --contract-address 0x0514cec3bbed728f67ac8ad4cbc2f41117dd275def238881ca008ea869cf2f06 --function "set_exercise_or_admin" --account-address 0x4edae16ce9ba4eecc9eb642633e997d2d39f68e0c87d6d3019086411342721c --inputs 0x023b86c1dadc957515a5f1b6a55c0df2753c99e0d3d1352aa599f1b28404cb0a 1 --max-fee auto --private-key-path ./.pkey_local

protostar -p devnet call --contract-address 0x0514cec3bbed728f67ac8ad4cbc2f41117dd275def238881ca008ea869cf2f06 --function "is_exercise_or_admin" --inputs 0x023b86c1dadc957515a5f1b6a55c0df2753c99e0d3d1352aa599f1b28404cb0a
```
